hero.title: Lotus Bridge
hero.subtitleVietnamese: Built by Vietnam. Bridging the World.
hero.mission: From the heart of Vietnam blooms the Lotus ‚Äî bridging blockchains, cultures, and futures. This is not just about swapping tokens. It's about freedom of movement, sovereignty for users, liquidity for protocols, visibility for local tokens, and economic growth for Vietnam.
hero.bridgingBlockchains: Bridging Blockchain Networks with Vietnamese Innovation

introductionSection.title: üåç The Problem: A Fragmented World of Chains
introductionSection.description: Today's blockchain landscape is vast, vibrant, and‚Ä¶ fractured. Each network speaks its own language, runs on its own logic, and is home to unique communities and ecosystems. But for the average user ‚Äî especially those in emerging markets like Vietnam ‚Äî navigating this complexity feels like crossing rivers with no bridges.

challenges.0: Multiple steps, tools, wallets needed for cross-chain swaps
challenges.1: Vietnamese tokens like VNDC, VNST, KNC, C98 often excluded
challenges.2: Clunky, risky, or impossible transactions between differentarchitectures
challenges.3: Global adoption stunted by exclusion, liquidity siloed, users confused

lotusSolution.title: Lotus Bridge Solution
lotusSolution.description: A trustless, multi-chain, architecture-agnostic super-bridge that blooms unity from diversity.

features.0: Universal bridge layer adapting to any network
features.2: Multi-wallet portal for seamless asset bridging

builtForVietnam.title: üáªüá≥ Built for Vietnam. Bridging the World.
builtForVietnam.description: Lotus Bridge is the first bridge built by Vietnamese for Vietnamese, designed with cultural, economic, and technological sensitivity. Supports local tokens often neglected by other platforms ‚Äî including SLP, VNST, SIPHER, KNC, KAI, and more.

infrastructureTomorrow.title: üí° Infrastructure of Tomorrow
infrastructureTomorrow.description: Lotus Bridge is not a temporary product. It's an infrastructure layer. Its architecture-agnostic model means it's future-proof ‚Äî adaptable to whatever blockchain innovations emerge. It's functional, essential, and deeply integrated into user habits and DeFi flows.

symbolismLotus.title: üå± The Symbolism of the Lotus

universalBridge.description: Able to adapt to any exchange method used in any network it connects to

symbolismLotus.quote: In Vietnamese culture, the lotus rises pure from murky waters. It represents resilience, rebirth, and peace. In blockchain, that water is fragmentation, isolation, and complexity. Lotus Bridge blooms as the answer ‚Äî creating order from chaos, clarity from confusion

But for everyday users ‚Äî especially those in emerging markets like Vietnam ‚Äî navigating this complexity feels like trying to cross a river without a bridge.

solution.description: Inspired by the lotus flower ‚Äî a sacred symbol of purity, resilience, and rebirth in Vietnamese culture ‚Äî Lotus Bridge emerges as a multi-chain superbridge: architecture-agnostic, trustless, and unifying.

whatIsLotus.title: What is Lotus Bridge?
whatIsLotus.description: Learn about the technology and capabilities of Lotus Bridge
whatIsLotus.content: Discover how Lotus Bridge functions as a dynamic, universal adapter across blockchains, enabling seamless cross-chain interaction regardless of architectural differences.

abstract.title: üå∏ Abstract
abstract.subtitle: The foundational vision and core mission of Lotus Bridge - A next-generation multi-chain interoperability protocol rooted in Vietnamese innovation.

projectOverview.title: Project Overview
projectOverview.content: Lotus Bridge is a next-generation multi-chain interoperability protocol, purpose-built to seamlessly connect heterogeneous blockchain networks. Designed by Vietnamese developers for the Vietnamese market and beyond, Lotus Bridge transcends the limitations of traditional bridges by enabling secure and flexible token transfers, swaps, and wallet-to-wallet communication across entirely different blockchain architectures‚Äîsuch as from Ethereum to Solana.
projectOverview.foundationalLayer: With multi-wallet support and a localized focus on tokens popular in Vietnam, Lotus Bridge is positioned to become a foundational layer for Vietnamese DeFi innovation, paving the way for Vietnamese developers and entrepreneurs to build cross-chain applications that can tap into global liquidity while maintaining a seamless user experience.

vietnameseInnovation.title: Vietnamese Innovation
vietnameseInnovation.description: Built by Vietnam, for Vietnam, bridging the world
vietnameseInnovation.marketNeeds: Designed with Vietnamese market needs in mind
vietnameseInnovation.nativeSupport: Native support for Vietnamese tokens (AXS, SLP, VNDC, VNST, KAI, SIPHER, A8, C98, KNC)
vietnameseInnovation.localizedUX: Localized user experience and cultural sensitivity
vietnameseInnovation.communityDriven: Community-driven development with Vietnamese stakeholder participation

visionImpact.title: üáªüá≥ Vision & Impact
visionImpact.description: Positioning Vietnam as a Web3 innovation hub
visionImpact.content: Lotus Bridge is more than a technical innovation‚Äîit's a symbol of connection between cultures, economies, and tomorrow's digital world. By integrating Vietnamese tokens into the global liquidity stream, Lotus Bridge empowers Vietnam to step confidently onto the Web3 stage. With seamless user experience, uncompromising security, and scalable infrastructure, we are laying the groundwork for Vietnam to emerge as a leading hub of Web3 innovation‚Äîpioneering cross-chain interoperability and shaping the future of decentralized finance.

whatIsLotus.title: What is Lotus Bridge?
whatIsLotus.subtitle: A flexible, global adapter across blockchains that transcends the limitations of traditional bridging.

dynamicUniversalAdapter.title: Dynamic Universal Adapter
dynamicUniversalAdapter.description1: Lotus Bridge is a decentralized application (dApp) and infrastructure protocol that enables users to connect wallets and bridge assets across multiple blockchain networks‚Äîregardless of their architecture, consensus mechanisms, or token standards.
dynamicUniversalAdapter.description2: With the ability to adapt to any exchange method supported by the connected networks, Lotus is not just a bridge: it is a dynamic, universal adapter between blockchains.

crossArchitecture.title: Cross-Architecture
crossArchitecture.description: Bridge between completely different blockchain architectures
crossArchitecture.details: Connect Ethereum to Solana, BNB Chain to Polygon, and much more - regardless of underlying technological differences.

multiWallet.title: Multi-Wallet Support
multiWallet.description: Connect and manage multiple wallets simultaneously
multiWallet.details: Seamlessly interact with MetaMask, Phantom, and other wallets in a unified interface.

adaptiveProtocol.title: Adaptive Protocol
adaptiveProtocol.description: Automatically adapts to available exchange methods
adaptiveProtocol.details: Dynamically selects the best bridging method based on network capabilities and user preferences.

coreFunctions.title: Core Functions
coreFunctions.description: What Lotus Bridge enables for users

walletConnection.title: Wallet Connection
walletConnection.description: Connect wallets from different blockchain ecosystems

crossChainSwaps.description: Exchange tokens across different blockchain networks

flexibleTransfers.description: Send to same address or different user addresses

userGuides.title: User Guides
userGuides.subtitle: Step-by-step guides to help you navigate and use Lotus Bridge effectively. From wallet connection to advanced bridging strategies.
userGuides.nativeSupport: Lotus Bridge offers native support for Vietnamese tokens often overlooked by other platforms.
userGuides.crossChainExample: Move your VNDC from Ethereum to Solana to enjoy lower fees and faster transactions.
userGuides.chainSwapsExample: Instantly swap AXS on Ronin for ETH on Ethereum without multiple steps.
userGuides.multiWalletExample: Bridge and swap between addresses you control across different chains.
userGuides.localizedDefiExample: Participate in DeFi protocols using Vietnamese tokens popular in the region.
userGuides.realWorldDescription: Examples of how to use Lotus Bridge in common Vietnamese token scenarios.
userGuides.bridgeTokensDescription: Complete step-by-step guide for bridging tokens across networks.
userGuides.newNetworksNote: New networks are continuously added to expand cross-chain capabilities.

security.title: Best Security Practices
security.description: Protect your assets when using cross-chain bridges

verifyUrl.title: Always Verify Bridge URLs
verifyUrl.description: Bookmark the official URL and avoid clicking on links from unknown sources.

doubleCheck.title: Double-Check Transaction Details
doubleCheck.description: Verify recipient address, amount, and network before confirming.

startSmall.title: Start with Small Amounts
startSmall.description: Test with smaller transactions before bridging large amounts.

keepRecords.title: Keep Transaction Records
keepRecords.description: Save transaction hashes and timestamps for reference.

commonIssues.title: Common Issues & Solutions
commonIssues.description: Quick fixes for the most common problems

transactionStuck.title: Stuck or Pending Transaction
transactionStuck.description: Your transaction was confirmed on the source chain but hasn't appeared on the destination chain.

solutions.0: Check the transaction status in our bridge explorer
solutions.1: Allow up to 30 minutes during periods of high network congestion
solutions.2: Contact support if it remains stuck for more than 1 hour

insufficientGas.title: Insufficient Gas Fees
insufficientGas.description: Transaction failed due to low gas fees or lack of native tokens.

solutions.0: Make sure you have enough native tokens (ETH, BNB, etc.) to cover gas fees
solutions.1: Increase the gas limit if the transaction keeps failing
solutions.2: Try during off-peak hours for lower fees

walletConnection.title: Wallet Connection Issues
walletConnection.description: Unable to connect wallet or wallet not detected.

solutions.0: Refresh the page and try connecting again
solutions.1: Check if your wallet extension is enabled
solutions.2: Switch to the correct network in your wallet
solutions.3: Clear your browser's cache and cookies

userGuides.walletDescription: Choose the best wallet for your network and experience level

metamask.name: MetaMask
metamask.description: Perfect for newcomers to DeFi. Simple interface with great guides and broad compatibility.

rabby.name: Rabby Wallet
rabby.description: Superior UI/UX with better asset management across EVM chains. Ideal for pro users.

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.description: The most popular and trusted wallet for the Solana ecosystem, with native SPL token support.

slush.name: Slush Wallet
slush.description: The official wallet developed by Mysten Labs for an optimized Sui blockchain experience.

step1.title: Install Your Preferred Wallet
step1.description: Download the recommended wallet for your target network from official sources

step2.title: Click "Connect Wallet"
step2.description: Locate the connect button at the top-right corner of the Lotus Bridge interface

step3.title: Approve the Connection
step3.description: Review permissions and authorize Lotus Bridge to interact with your wallet securely

background.subtitle: Understand the challenges that led to the creation of Lotus Bridge ‚Äî and why Vietnamese innovation matters in the global DeFi landscape.

background.fragmentedWorldTitle: üåç The Problem: A Fragmented Blockchain World
background.landscapeDescription: Today‚Äôs blockchain landscape is vast, vibrant ‚Äî and fragmented. Ethereum. Solana. BNB Chain. Polygon. Cosmos. Each network speaks its own language, follows its own logic, and hosts unique communities and ecosystems.
background.userNavigationDescription: But for everyday users ‚Äî especially in emerging markets like Vietnam ‚Äî navigating this complexity is like trying to cross a river without a bridge.

currentChallenges.multipleSteps: Want to swap assets from Solana to Ethereum? You‚Äôll need multiple steps, tools, wallets, and bridges.
currentChallenges.clumsyRisky: Often clunky, risky, or outright impossible when networks have fundamentally different architectures.
currentChallenges.vietnameseTokens: Vietnamese tokens like VNDC, VNST, KNC, and C98? Frequently excluded from global bridging conversations.
currentChallenges.globalAdoption: Global adoption? Blocked by exclusion. Liquidity? Isolated. Users? Confused.

background.resultDescription: The dream of a unified Web3 world remains out of reach. Each blockchain becomes an isolated island, and users must navigate the treacherous waters between them.
background.lotusEnterTitle: Enter Lotus Bridge ‚Äì Blooming Unity from Diversity
background.vietnameseSolutionDescription: A Vietnam-inspired solution for global blockchain interoperability
background.lotusInspiredDescription: Inspired by the lotus ‚Äî a sacred symbol of purity, resilience, and rebirth in Vietnamese culture ‚Äî Lotus Bridge emerges as a multi-chain superbridge: architecture-agnostic and trustless.
background.universalDescription: Adaptable to any exchange mechanism used by the networks it connects.
background.crossArchitectureDescription: Swap and send across chains that don‚Äôt share address formats or VM compatibility.

tokenBridging.details: Move any supported token between blockchains with under 15-second finality and minimal fees.

steps.finalConfirmation: 6. Consensus Validators provide final confirmation and settlement

steps.stakeholderVoting: 4. All entity types vote based on stake/participation
steps.implementation: 5. Approved proposals implemented by Bridge Operators and Relayers

faqs.vietnameseDescription: Questions specific to Vietnamese users and market

security.title: üîê Security
security.subtitle: End-to-end safety by design, reinforced by transparency, governance, and community education.

lockAndRelease.title: Lock & Release Model
lockAndRelease.description: Supports canonical token bridging by locking tokens in custody on the source chain and releasing them on the destination chain. All custody contracts are immutable and audited.

mintAndBurn.title: Mint & Burn Model
mintAndBurn.description: For synthetic assets, minting is only allowed with explicit permission from token issuers. The bridge holds no unilateral mint authority, and token owners can revoke mint rights anytime.

tokenListing.title: Token Listing Security
tokenListing.description: Only governance-approved tokens can be bridged. No arbitrary token activation. Safelist model enforced by on-chain registry.

emergencyPowers.title: Emergency Powers
emergencyPowers.description: Can pause token pairs or entire bridge during exploit events or abnormal behavior. Cannot access funds, mint tokens, or override contracts.

attackResponse.title: Attack Response
attackResponse.description: In case of a foreseen or live attack, guardians act quickly to contain damage, notify the community, and coordinate with token issuers to resolve issues.

reentrancy.title: Reentrancy Protection
reentrancy.description: All functions interacting with external tokens follow checks-effects-interactions and are protected by ReentrancyGuard.

overflow.title: Overflow Protection
overflow.description: SafeMath or Solidity 0.8+ native overflow protections are used throughout.

permissionControl.title: Permission Control
permissionControl.description: Sensitive roles like minting or upgrades are gated behind AccessControl and/or multisig, never assigned to EOAs.

upgradeSafety.title: Upgrade Safety
upgradeSafety.description: If contracts are upgradable, they follow the UUPS proxy pattern. Admin logic is controlled by the DAO or multisig.

flashLoanProtection.title: Flash Loan Protection
flashLoanProtection.description: Bridge behavior includes checks against flash loan manipulations, liquidity spoofing, and replay attacks.

gasDos.title: Gas DoS Protection
gasDos.description: Contracts are written with bounded logic to avoid denial-of-service attacks due to excessive gas use.

governanceAccountability.title: Accountable Governance
governanceAccountability.description: Unlike anonymous DAOs, the Lotus governance layer is composed of identifiable actors.

identityRequirement.title: Identity Requirement
identityRequirement.description: All governance members are known and publicly verifiable, reducing attack surfaces from anonymous insiders.

legalLiability.title: Legal Liability
legalLiability.description: Governance actors can be held accountable under real-world laws for malicious actions or negligence.

auditTrail.title: Audit Trail
auditTrail.description: All votes, emergency actions, and listing decisions are signed on-chain with visible history and rationales.

reputationModel.title: Reputation Model
reputationModel.description: Bad actors face removal, public blacklisting, and potential legal proceedings if responsible for protocol abuse.

verifyAddress.title: Verify Wallet Addresses
verifyAddress.description: Always verify full wallet addresses when bridging. Never rely only on the first and last digits.

protectKeys.title: Protect Private Keys
protectKeys.description: Never share your seed phrase or private key. Use hardware wallets or trusted browser extensions.

officialSources.title: Use Official Sources
officialSources.description: Only use the official bridge UI: https://bridge.lotus.zone. Avoid links from DMs or random social posts.

socialEngineering.title: Beware Social Engineering
socialEngineering.description: Lotus Bridge will never DM you. No one should ask for your keys or funds. Be wary of impersonators.

tokenRisk.title: Token Risk Assessment
tokenRisk.description: Only DAO-approved tokens are supported. If it's not listed, don't bridge it.

gasExploits.title: Gas Exploit Awareness
gasExploits.description: Watch for abnormally high gas fees ‚Äî they may be signs of malicious contract behavior.

blockExplorerUse.title: Use Block Explorers
blockExplorerUse.description: Always check your transaction on Etherscan or Solscan to confirm correct execution and destination.

reporting.title: Report Issues
reporting.description: Report phishing or protocol issues at https://report.lotus.zone

securityAudits.title: Security Audits & Compliance
securityAudits.trailOfBits: Trail of Bits - Smart contract security audit

bugBounty.title: Bug Bounty Program
bugBounty.scope: Covers smart contracts, web interfaces, and infrastructure

intro.title: The Problem: A Fragmented Blockchain World
intro.description: Today‚Äôs blockchain landscape is vast, vibrant ‚Äî and fragmented. Each network speaks its own language, follows its own logic, and hosts unique communities and ecosystems. But for everyday users ‚Äî especially in emerging markets like Vietnam ‚Äî navigating this complexity is like trying to cross a river without a bridge.
intro.enterLotus: Enter Lotus Bridge ‚Äì Blooming Unity from Diversity
intro.enterDescription: Inspired by the lotus ‚Äî a sacred symbol of purity, resilience, and rebirth in Vietnamese culture ‚Äî Lotus Bridge emerges as a multi-chain superbridge: architecture-agnostic and trustless.
